channel.title: Anyone know the MAX texture size?
channel.description:
Anyone know what the maximum texture size is? Also what's the standard size, i forget, 64x64?
Thanks.

item.title: Anyone know the MAX texture size?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Thanks CJ, yep that’s right.
Can’t believe i don’t know this, i’ve converted 'em.

Just looked at the raw texture files from the 317, they look 128x128 as well.
Not sure if method367 is texture size, if so the MAX texture size is 256x256 - looks good.

Information for those who want it :-
MAX texture size for 317’s is 128x128.
method371 contains support for 2 texture sizes 64x64 or 128 x 128.
Data is stored alpha,red,gren,blue, each being 4096 or 16384 bytes in size depending on bitmap size. = 64x64 or 128x128.
It can be changed, you either have to make a special case for 256x256 OR all your textures must be that size. There’d be a crap load of things to change anyway.

bitmap loader.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know the MAX texture size?

item.title: Anyone know the MAX texture size?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Biggest I’ve seen I think is 256x256, and the standard is 128x128 for 508+, but they do use several 64x64’s aswell.
